summary: Build a virtual assistant app named "Rubina" with multi-language support (Hindi, English, Bangla, Assamese), device control capabilities, and Google connectivity/integration.
known_issues: Deployment to network failed ("Unable to complete deployment"); user requested retry.

existing_features.title: Create the core assistant UI for an app named "Rubina" with a chat-style interface (message history, user input box, send button, clear chat) and a simple "Rubina" header/branding.
Add multilingual UI support for English, Hindi, Bangla, and Assamese, including a language selector that immediately updates all user-facing UI strings.
Implement voice features for Rubina: voice input (speech-to-text) to fill the chat input and text-to-speech playback for Rubina responses, with controls to enable/disable each.

Define a basic assistant behavior in the app (no external LLM integration): when the user sends a message, Rubina returns a deterministic, local response and can recognize a small set of built-in commands (e.g., "open google", "open youtube", "clear chat", "switch language to …").

Add a "Device Control" section that exposes only browser-allowed controls (e.g., fullscreen toggle, copy-to-clipboard for a message, opening approved links) and clearly labels any unsupported device controls as "Not available in browser".

Add a "Google" section that provides safe, no-auth connectivity options: open Google Search with the user query and quick links to common Google properties (e.g., Search, Gmail, Maps) without claiming account-level integration.
Persist user preferences (selected language, voice toggles) and optionally chat history in the Motoko canister so settings can be restored per authenticated user.

Add a Settings page/panel including: language selection, voice input toggle, voice output toggle, and a short "Capabilities & Limits" explanation covering Google integration and device control limitations in a web app.
Choose and apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the Rubina assistant (color palette, typography, spacing, component styling) and apply it consistently across all screens.

Add generated static image assets for Rubina branding (logo + simple mascot/avatar) and render them in the UI (e.g., header and assistant message avatar) from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via backend).

Identify the root cause of the previous Internet Computer deployment failure ("Unable to complete deployment") by capturing the full build/deploy logs and making the minimal code/config changes needed so a clean deploy succeeds.

Add a lightweight preflight validation step to the project build that checks for required Internet Computer project files/configuration and fails with clear English messages when prerequisites are missing or inconsistent.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add multi-language support: Hindi, English, Bangla, Assamese
Enable the assistant to control the user’s device
Connect/integrate the assistant with Google services
